title: Most popular global ads shared in October 2016
summary: This statistic presents the October Online Advertisements worldwide ads 30 day shared as of 2016 .
At that time , Shell_–_Best_Day_Of_My_Life_#makethefuture had a 30 day shared of 1017.53 thousands shares , making it the largest Online Advertisements globally .

data.Online Advertisements: Shell – Best Day Of My Life #makethefuture
Nintendo – First Look at Nintendo Switch
Adidas – Football needs creators feat. Pogba
Dior – Dior J’adore – The Absolute Femininity
Louis Vuitton – The Louis Vuitton Cruise 2017 Collection with Alicia Vikander

gold: This statistic shows most shared global online ads in October 2016 . The Shell commercial ‘ Best Day of my Life ' ranked first with over 1 million shares in October 2016 .
